title: The pro-nilpotent Lawrence-Krammer-Bigelow representation. (arXiv:2211.01855v1 [math.GT])
description: We construct a 3-variable enrichment of the Lawrence-Krammer-Bigelow (LKB) representation of the braid groups, which is the limit of a pro-nilpotent tower of representations having the original LKB representation as its bottom layer. We also construct analogous pro-nilpotent towers of representations of surface braid groups and loop braid groups.
dc:creator: Martin Palmer, Arthur Soulié
